sqls.sql: UPDATE ea_import_tmp SET ea_id = @ea_id, ea_status = @ea_status, ea_no = @ea_no, ea_name = @ea_name, ea_card_no = @ea_card_no, ea_type1 = @ea_type1, ea_type2 = @ea_type2, ea_type3 = @ea_type3, ea_type4 = @ea_type4, ea_type5 = @ea_type5, ea_type6 = @ea_type6, ea_type7 = @ea_type7, ea_type8 = @ea_type8, factory_no = @factory_no, workshop_no = @workshop_no, line_no = @line_no, ea_cost_produce_c = @ea_cost_produce_c, ea_cost_before_c = @ea_cost_before_c, ea_cost_after_c = @ea_cost_after_c, ea_cost_idle_c = @ea_cost_idle_c, ea_cost_worker_c = @ea_cost_worker_c, ea_rmk01 = @ea_rmk01, ea_rmk02 = @ea_rmk02, ea_rmk03 = @ea_rmk03, ea_rmk04 = @ea_rmk04, ea_rmk05 = @ea_rmk05, ea_rmk06 = @ea_rmk06, ea_rmk07 = @ea_rmk07, ea_rmk08 = @ea_rmk08, ea_rmk09 = @ea_rmk09, ea_rmk10 = @ea_rmk10, crt_time = @crt_time, crt_user = @crt_user, crt_user_no = @crt_user_no, crt_user_name = @crt_user_name, crt_host = @crt_host, upd_time = @upd_time, upd_user = @upd_user, upd_user_no = @upd_user_no, upd_user_name = @upd_user_name, upd_host = @upd_host, wkc_no = @wkc_no, wka_no = @wka_no, ea_para_group = @ea_para_group;
